item.title: About Andreas Bergström
item.description: Born in Sweden in the late 80’s I got my first computer in the early 90’s, an Intel 386 with MS-DOS. Having to start games like Retal and Lemmings from the command line was enough challenge at the time, but when I later upgraded to Windows 3.1 I actually started tinkering with the computer a bit more. My friends were however already using Windows 95 and played games like Sim City 2000, Heroes of Might and Magic, Warcraft and Magic Carpet.
